channel.title: Docs on mlzhang-wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on mlzhang-wiki

item.description: 安装hugo # brew install hugo 创建项目 # hugo new site mlzhang_wiki cd mlzhang_wiki git init # 安装主题 git submodule add https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book themes/hugo-book hugo mod init github.com/repo/path # config.toml 添加 [module] [[module.imports]] path = 'github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book' # 拷贝示例 cp -R themes/hugo-book/exampleSite/content . 启动本地服务 # hugo server -D
